name: Maple Wood Floor Lamp: Clarity
description: This large lamp can be found in the Yashiro Commission headquarters. It is quite pricey, and its creation process requires a lot of material and manpower.\nIt is said that the Yashiro Commission once spent a large sum of money during a certain economically lean period to hire artisans to make a great number of products, such that these artisans might sustain their livelihoods. This special lamp was purchased during that period.
